full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DREGS PA SDE BRGYAD GSER SKYEMS GTONG BA'I CHO GA BDUD RTZI RLABS 'PHRENG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES DREGS PA SDE BRGYAD LA GSER SKYEMS GTONG BA'I CHO GA BDUD RTZI RLABS 'PHRENG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BSOD NAMS STOBS KYIS, MNGON PAR MTHONG BA BDE WANG PHUN TSOGS BSAM GRUB KYIS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I SKYES DANG BCAS 'PHRIN YIG GIS LAM NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR KU S'A LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS PHRAL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI GU SHRI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL LO, ,)
